  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 Top note is Cardamom; middle note is Toffee; base note is Amberwood. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                             <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">399</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Harsh and overpowering cardamom note
                </div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="66826"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.63.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cardamom-63.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cardamom</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.434.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Toffee-434.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Toffee</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.691.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amberwood-691.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amberwood</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="66826"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='75b47a0e9a205d074ff096a60f7cc93e974' slotpayload='{"ct":"lLhv9tmPDcRhn\/TOczmhnkTwV+UXsASOeqYKKcYApQ3auT0WbG+KQVLLydWkMQt0fZ+H65mWETrtExavd+I19Da2qlpIi8lijjjsuuoAwZS\/QBg7DeEQvwRPe\/6pEBdYik3FlTTeA54BuPMLK+KlK45b9lvHwT9t6Qls\/S11pXwaeOR3TmqxVNsl\/qHB8k1NcPlF42LYJPoX7vEXdQRgwnbYr9p5RjYliXtZD3ILY4vYz89BTxZxQEkXp\/elcVPGb\/Ntcj7IZtg5DimVLZ0IcNTkt0KlPgwMLaAKklQvtV\/Lx5WcbNb0Sqh1CwynO6Eu","iv":"637c52abc4ceed569304f2dc0496eda5","s":"0ac5f3ab2169027a"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2369172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369172" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumer5501833fan3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumer5501833fan3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369172ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369172" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198755">perfumer5501833fan3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 05:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not worth a 4.58. Just really sweet, only can be pulled off at a date night or night party. Bit juvenile.<br />
I kind of like it though, I genuinely will never understand the glaze these fragrances get though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2369172"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2369172#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367142" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367142" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RGH01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1331188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RGH01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/The-Dark-Side-40884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Dark Side"title="The Dark Side"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367142ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367142" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188">RGH01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 08:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Most Wanted, ironic name because I couldnt possibly want this fragrance any less. Is this seriously what passes for good on the designer market these days? I honestly cannot imagine someone over the age of 15 even considering wearing this dreadful scent.<br />
<br />
A very simple note breakdown, with toffee at its core. I have to give it credit, it does smell of toffee, although its almost sickly sweet. Combined with an obnoxious amount of amberwoods though, and it ruins the whole scent with its scratchy soapiness. <br />
<br />
Its somehow sweet and fresh at the same time; I can see why that would be desired amongst teenagers. It just reeks of adolescence and immaturity, which is fine if youre of that age, but no adult should be wearing this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2367142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2367142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367121" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367121" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bibidiboo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1603264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bibidiboo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367121ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367121" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1603264">bibidiboo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 08:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A simple sweet fragrance to be worn during the colder days. Sweet Cardamom bomb with very faint wood. If you want something versatile along the lines, I would say go for Most Wanted Parfum.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2367121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2367121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367087" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thatoneguywithasuiton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thatoneguywithasuiton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343825">Thatoneguywithasuiton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening smells like invictus (bubblegum) and after it dries down it has a barbershop smell to it (gourmand smell idk) i regret buying this since it has the same smell of a 20$ fragrance in drugstore in my town, so fucki*g overrated</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2362976" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Prunel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Prunel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Opus-XII-Rose-Incense-74282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opus XII  Rose Incense"title="Opus XII  Rose Incense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2362976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2362976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223">Prunel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-27">11/27/24 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is pretty good. The opening is a bit harsh and "chemical" smelling. After a few minutes it calms down and transforms into a very sweet fragrance. There's nothing complicated here, it's made to smell good and it does that really well. I got this as a gift, I wouldn't have bought it myself. Great for a daily wear for the price. Performance is very good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2362976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2362976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361229" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="deuceaye24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2203415.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="deuceaye24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Parfum-81508.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81508.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Parfum"title="Acqua di Gi Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361229ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361229" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203415">deuceaye24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely loved this when I first got it. Fresh-sweet opening, fairly harsh but quickly settles into a gourmandy melted caramel scent. Woody? I didnt get that at all, its linear for the whole wearing duration. I didnt find out loud or projecting but the scent trail is delicious. My gf said its very addicting. <br />
I wore it during the summer nights right into the cooler months. I find it to be very versatile and never got cloying. Well blended, mass appealing, and right in line with todays mens going out frags. <br />
<br />
Only downside was I got bored of it. The note breakdown on here is simple, and thats what this frag is to me. Id still recommend trying it out, its hard not to like unless you absolutely hate sweet scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2361229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2361229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Tis stuff blew me away!! Opening is strong and smells kind of like ginger?! But it's very pleasant. Then the toffee and spicy cardamon go so well together and this has crazy projection as well and lasts for what seems an eternity. Ladies love this too, so just do yourself a favour and cop it honestly. Great for Fall/Winter.<br />
10/10 broooo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2360966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2360966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360453" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FredFrag_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FredFrag_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360453ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360453" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335781">FredFrag_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 00:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As someone coming from hot climate South East Asian country. This perfume is suitable in AC room or building. The opening has very simple deep sweet cardamom, its not too spicy and herby. Then the sweet roasted toffee, almost like fresh baked chcolate coffee dessert notes really makes the perfume alive. <br />
<br />
It feels like you sitting in a bakery in the morning with fresh chocolate filling croissant topped with vanilla icing with a cup of cappucino beside. One time, a girl telling me I smell like a peanut butter chocolate waffle but in a good way. Worth blind buy for sweet tooth and gourmand frag lover.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2360453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2360453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very strong and harsh opening, but very nice dry down. Didn't think it was anything crazy but it grew on me. Perfect toffee middle note. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927185">Atraius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 10:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had really high expectations for this fragrance looking at the 4.58 rating. Its good but it doesnt blow your socks off and smell like the best thing ever. Maybe I was expecting the scent to have more depth but its just a linear caramel toffee fragrance with some little spices. The longevity on my skin was average at most around 7 hours however projection and silage were nice. Overall this fragrance is good but its not something that you must have in your collection. 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2358713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2358713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354409" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Amazing cardamom fresh spicy opening with a sweet toffee drydown. Great for dates and parties. Best of the line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2352233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2352233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351926" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ALakota"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1565541.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ALakota" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abercrombie-Fitch/Fierce-3508.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3508.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fierce"title="Fierce"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565541">ALakota</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 08:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Everyone seems to smell this one pretty differently. I am so confused lol. To me, it smells like such a flat, inoffensive sweetness, and like the ultimate middle of the road of the trend of linear sweet scents like Victory Elixir, Scandal absolu, a lot of the Armani Codes, etc. but so many people call it fresh or woody or spicy. It is so smooth and well blended that I can't imagine calling it woody or spicy like some people do. I have no clue what they're talking about. Before I go on, I should say that I do love it, and I think now it is my favorite of all of those sort of scents. It's just really nice in the air and doesn't lean in any direction really. I've had it forever and never payed it much attention, but decided to really give it a shot because it tests insanely good with women, and after living with it a bit I can see why. I can't even explain why, other than that it's the one that doesn't get annoying to me after a while of wearing it. My second favorite like this is either the most wanted parfum or Scandal Absolu, but even with Scandal, as much as I love it, there is something that gets to me after a little while. If money is tight for you, I recommend sampling all these new sweet scents and trying each one for like a whole day to see how you like it over hours and hours. They all smell so similar to me in passing that I needed to test them a bit, and I recommend you do too. If I was going to recommend one to someone who is going to blind buy, I would go with this one 1000%. It really is amazing, and while it's similar to a lot of things, it really stands out as the best in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2351926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2351926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351093" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2020387">wahib</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 19:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Incredible sweet but mature amber, nice and woody but not overpowering/old man smell, and spicy. This is the perfect winter fragrance for men imo. It projects easily 7+ hours and lasts even longer, I've taken a shower after wearing this thing and i can still smell it afterwards. And it's very versatile too, because it's not overpowering but still strong you can wear it almost anywhere. You can find it most places for $70-$100, not the cheapest but definitely worth it 100%.<br />
10/10 no complaints.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2347041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2347041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I will say though, at least to my nose, ysl myself smells really similar to this. don't know what it is tbh but regardless both scents are worth having. this compared to the parfum, which was fruit snacks and grape juice (saying this in best way possible bc i love it as well), this is so much deeper and mature in comparison imo. stays dark with the cardamom while also not retaining a ~stank~ that cardamom can sometimes have. a lot of people have said this can be for everyday use. rightfully so tbh. not complex like a niche house would be but also not simple and linear where you'd smell it everywhere. have gotten only positive feedback from this one, 8.92/10!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486700">SLaYz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 23:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is great. I had a hard time deciding on this or the Parfum and still want the Parfum. But this is so nice. The sweet toffee I thought would be something to sweet . But there's some spiciness and woody note that that keeps this from being just a sweet fragrance. I actually pick up on the spiciness and woody more then the toffee once it's dried down for a while. Last long probably 8 hour , I fell asleep and next morning could still smell it pretty good as a skin scent . This is a new staple in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2344902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2344902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344818" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2338958"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2338958#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338952" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338952" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bingo30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1851398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bingo30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338952ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338952" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398">Bingo30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm unimpressed by every Wanted fragrance I have smelled. Comes across cheap, boring, and juvenile. The same amberwood-ambroxan-maltol thing being done everywhere these days. Smells, overly synthetic, blurry, and just sort of soulless. AI generated "date night bubblegum." Cloying.<br />
<br />
I'm not even biased against modern sweet fragrances. JPG Le Male Elixir or Hugo Boss Private Accord are as modern and sweet as it gets but at least they have a beautiful separation of clear notes and it doesn't smell like a big mess. Those smell like the perfumer at least tried. This is not artfully made.<br />
<br />
5.9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2338952"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2338952#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Also very similar to the Stronger With You line. It does have a sharper sweetness that slightly sets it apart but you'd have to have a good nose or have them side by side to notice the difference. There's just not enough kick for me and makes it feel way overpriced cause i'm having to use 3x as much juice as i'd like too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2335035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2335035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334066" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xaki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1594515.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xaki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334066ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334066" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594515">xaki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 21:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stronger with you Intensely vs The most wanted EDP intense is the ultimate battle between the biggest winter fragrances, and I would have to say that TMW is the winner. Both fragrances are very nice and smell quite similar, around 80% to my nose, however TMW is richer, darker, and stronger with an amberwoody base. Relatively speaking, SWYI is actually more versatile, it has a good amount of aromatics encompassing the DNA which gives it a sparkly bright pop around the edges which actually makes it more mass appealing, with also a very subtle hazelnuttyness in the background. If that suits you more, than SWYI is the right decision, but for my taste, TMW takes the cake. If I'm to be totally honest, I am not crazy about either fragrance. both are very basic smelling and very linear - think caramel toffee bubblegum- but if you want a sweet fragrance you can't go wrong with for the wintertime, these two are great options.<br />
Also, as far as designer fragrances go, this isn't "Christmas in a bottle" that would be Spicebomb Extreme</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2334066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2334066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Might be better that Stronger with you Intensly</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2333446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2333446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333309" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="randomazn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1774458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1774458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="randomazn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); This is by far the best designer fragrance in terms of value for money. Toffee, caramel with a hint of spicy, gourmand goodness. The Most Wanted is youthful, playful and sexy. I can imagine myself wearing this to the club, dating or just casual hangouts with friends.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2333309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2333309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329934" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329934" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dariusp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2275854"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2275854.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dariusp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Dylan-Blue-40031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"title="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329934ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329934" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2275854">Dariusp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 03:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is something you need when youre at party. You will get so much compliments and attention. align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2329752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2329752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328611" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AleWoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1973147"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AleWoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1973147">AleWoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 15:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro The Most Wanted Review<br />
<br />
Overall Rating: 4.3/5<br />
<br />
Scent Profile:<br />
Azzaro The Most Wanted is a warm, spicy, and inviting fragrance with a bold edge. It opens with a burst of cardamom, lending a sweet, spicy kick thats immediately captivating. This top note quickly blends into a rich toffee accord that gives it a creamy, almost gourmand-like appeal without being overly sweet.<br />
<br />
As it develops, The Most Wanted introduces woody and amber notes in the base, with a warm amberwood accord that adds depth and smoothness to the scent. These woody undertones are slightly smoky, balanced perfectly with the lingering spice, creating a seductive and confident finish. This combination makes it feel luxurious and modern, with a hint of mystery.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
The performance of Azzaro The Most Wanted is impressive. It has strong longevity, often lasting 8-10 hours on the skin, with excellent projection in the first few hours. Its the kind of scent that will get noticed, making it ideal for evening outings or cooler weather, where it really shines.<br />
<br />
Versatility:<br />
This fragrance leans toward colder seasons, making it a fantastic choice for fall and winter. The warm, spicy, and slightly sweet profile makes it perfect for nights out, date nights, or special occasions, adding a touch of sophistication and allure to any setting.<br />
<br />
Overall Impression:<br />
Azzaro The Most Wanted is an alluring, masculine fragrance that blends warmth and spice with a subtle sweetness. Its bold yet refined, ideal for those who enjoy a fragrance with depth and presence. A perfect choice for someone who wants to make a memorable impression and embrace a bit of mystery and sophistication in their fragrance wardrobe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2328611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2328611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909255">TrashBoat0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 15:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overly sweet, bordering on cloying.  Doesn't develop through the drydown; it's just an almost sickly sweet cardamom/amber/toffee all the way through.  It's not bad - but seems like a real simple/overly sweet scent.  The Spicebomb line can also be very sweet - but there's a lot more complex spiciness going on there.  If I was going to spend nearly $100 on a fall/winter scent, I'd go with one of the Spicebombs instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2316851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2316851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1920112">zean_shao</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 23:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is a tad harsh and fruity (for some reason) but the drydown is well-blended and sweet without being cloying. Washes the parfum IMO</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2312873"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2312873#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2308325"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2308325#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308244" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308244" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="petewentos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381735"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1381735.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="petewentos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-55785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau"title="Le Beau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308244ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308244" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381735">petewentos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 17:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens up very aromatic with the cardamom until the gourmand toffee accord becomes more prominent in the heart. It's not too cloying, as the amberwood interlaces with the toffee and introduces a warm spicy and woody accord, which all blends together in a complementary way. Overall, the fragrance is a unique and decadent gourmand toffee that is seductive and irresistible, perfectly suited for the evening during the colder months of the year. In terms of longevity, it easily lasts me the entire day and has great projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2308244"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2308244#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307290" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alexandrewb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729597"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729597.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alexandrewb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307290ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307290" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729597">alexandrewb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Most Wanted<br />
<br />
Launched in 2021 by Azzaro, it is a men's perfume from the oriental spicy olfactory family. With top notes of cardamom, it opens with a spicy and fresh touch. In the heart, the gourmand sweetness of toffee offers an enveloping creaminess without being cloying. The amberwood base adds depth and warmth, creating a refined and long-lasting fragrance.<br />
<br />
With excellent fixation and moderate projection, it is versatile for various occasions, especially in colder climates or evening events. The Most Wanted is recommended for confident men looking for a seductive and sophisticated fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2307290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2307290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306133" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jakub081026"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2277304"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jakub081026" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Instant-Crush-54885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Instant Crush"title="Instant Crush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2277304">Jakub081026</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 15:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is just so freaking good. One of my fragrances for life for sure. It starts sweet spicy almost like grape juice or sum its really really good. Then dries down to a beautiful toffe caramel type off scent with a little bit of woodines and spicyness to it. The projection for me is alr and the longevity is about 7-8 hours on skin. Overall i really recommend this fragrance if you love sweet fragrances but watch out! This can be headache-inducing for some.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2306133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2306133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301448" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301448" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mertcho17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2169607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mertcho17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Madison-Pour-Homme-45884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Madison Pour Homme"title="Madison Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301448ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301448" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169607">Mertcho17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is very spicy and the cardamom bothers me, but after time, the spice and sweetness combine and a beautiful fragrance emerges. Some people may be disturbed by the cardamom in the opening.<br />
<br />
longevity:8.5/10<br />
projection:8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2301448"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2301448#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
