padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289437" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="S_Mazza"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416504"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="S_Mazza" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Eau-Sauvage-231.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.231.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Sauvage"title="Eau Sauvage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289437ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289437" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416504">S_Mazza</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eau de Rum-Soaked Pirate.  A bit "synthetic" feeling, but quite pleasant, actually, if you like sweet scents.  But I find it can cause headaches after a while.  Or you might just get sick of it after a few hours.  Worth a look, but not for everyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2289437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2289437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288518" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288518" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rr690"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1322949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rr690" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moschino/Uomo-730.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.730.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uomo?"title="Uomo?"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288518ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288518" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1322949">rr690</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 15:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has the DNA of the original and other flankers so its a sweet beast mode fragrance that's a safe bet. I find this flanker to be more on the woodier side of the spectrum and slightly more musky. Like the original and all of the other flankers on my skin its 12 hours plus with monster projection. Its a date night or fall/winter wear.<br />
The retail and discounter price is way too much considering other cheaper options that smell the same with the same performance. Its still on my list for whenever the prices starts to dip when its been on the market longer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2288518"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2288518#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288091" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 08:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro's The Most Wanted Intense EDP is a very attractive and safe fragrance. I'm getting notes of Sweet Caramel some Woodiness and also hints of Spice. The Spice is not as dominating as listed on Fragrantica, it's pretty subtle to my nose. The Opening and Dry-Down are both good in my opinion, maybe the Dry-Down loses just a little something compared to the Opening but it's still good. The scent reminds me subtly of Apple Juice or Apple Cider even though there are no Apple notes within the scent to my knowledge. There is a slight edge to the scent, it makes it seem like a bad boy fragrance but I feel like a gentleman can pull this off too. I think this is as mass-appealing as a fragrance can get, I'm not sure if anyone can dislike this unless they really dislike Caramel or Sweet scents in general. The Most Wanted EDP is an 8.5/10 for me, really good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2288091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2288091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2287433" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Albesure80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214808"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2214808.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Albesure80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2287433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2287433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214808">Albesure80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My favorite from the wanted line by Azzaro. I have Wanted by Night EDT, but this one is a notch higher in my opinion. Definitely a winter or fall fragrance. This one is much more powerful than the Wanted by Night. 4-5 spays will be enough.  My Mom even said she liked it and she doesn't ever give me compliments on my colognes. I'm not much into the Chrome line but the Wanted line is where it's at Gents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2287433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2287433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285727" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
performance easily 8-10 hours with strong projection of 1-2 hours<br />
scent wise 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2278773"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2278773#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278003" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amitsharma37"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2193227.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amitsharma37" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193227">amitsharma37</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Only good in winters. Yes its like spicebomb but not the strongest projection and sillage. It will perform WELL in winters and by well means 4-5 hours. On clothes it could last for 6-7 hours. Drydown is good but its very generic. If you are a perfume lover then this will not stand out. Not dark and masculine as someone mentioned in the comments so please don't follow that. Overall if you will beast mode fragrances then you know my answer. For the people who love mild fragrances then this is definitely for you. People around you will like this fragrance as its for close encounters and work really well. Winter date night, definitely wear this as the fragrance is comforting in the drydown. Very likeable. Hope I helped by writing this review.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2278003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2278003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276122" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TrainerDario"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243818"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2243818.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TrainerDario" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276122ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276122" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243818">TrainerDario</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I honestly don't know how anyone could possibly dislike this scent, it's simple but soooo good. This is by far the number one fragrance I get compliments on, but I will say it has a more 'youthful' scent profile that is really only there because of that sweetness it carries throughout the opening and well into the dry down. If you're an older guy or even got more of the traditional 'manly' aesthetic to you I'd suggest trying it out first before buying, as it might be too sweet and be mismatched with your look. If you're a young guy and want an amazingly valued date night/bar hopping/clubbing fragrance for the cooler months - stop reading and buy a bottle, this stuffs magical. <br />
<br />
10/10, my favorite scent by far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2276122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2276122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211425">Abdelsalam tartoussy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent is very good <br />
But how u guys telling that this is a beast mode?!<br />
Performance below avreage maybe becauze new batches got reformulated i dont know!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2276085"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2276085#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vlab_frag_enthusiast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076836"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2076836.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vlab_frag_enthusiast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Infrared-Eau-de-Parfum-81409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum"title="Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076836">vlab_frag_enthusiast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 15:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Two sprays of this filled my whole house and my parents couldnt stop complaining how sweet ot was since it was very hot outside. This is best for winter and autumn but you can also use this on cooler nights in spring and summer. Best date fragrance there is. Good price, not the best tho. Very cool and satisfying bottle design with high quality materials. Nice cap that clicks into place. Best azzaro fragrance ever made and ive tried all of them. 12+ hours easily with very good projection and sillage. I could talk about this fragrance all day. Better than 95% of sweet fragrances and one of the best designers for not a lot. Opening isnt very good if you arent a big fan of catdamom but the cardamom helps so much in the dry down with thw toffe and ambery woodiness. After 15 minutes it becomes very sweet, soothing, sexy and nice. I wore this in the summer and i dont recommend it but still the ladies were giving me good looks. 100% recommend. If you already have the most wanted parfum then you dont need this since ghey are very similar but this one is the true goat and is better. Do not overspray while staying inside because it can give headaches if oversprayed inside with no ventilation. Price 7/10, smell 9/10, longvevity 10/10, projection 10/10. Overall 9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2273998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2273998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Filosykos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1116950"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1116950.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Filosykos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1116950">Filosykos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 09:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's very generic yes you have smelled it before a sickly sweet clubbing scent. But damn if this isn't the best performing fragrance I've ever tried. Two sprays and it's projecting like Godzilla's breath.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2271349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2271349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270717" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270717" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="olfactorysettings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205323"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="olfactorysettings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270717ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270717" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205323">olfactorysettings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 19:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impressions of this: refined, akin to a more expensive cologne. It's very smooth but you do have to be OK with cardamom, which I like but don't necessarily love. It can kind of dominate a scent and it almost does here except for how well blended this is. Once the cardamom fades, the fragrance really shines IMO and a really pleasant sniff worthy woody-sweetness emerges. The sweetness is perfectly balanced with the woodiness and I can see why it garners compliments. Call me crazy but I think this is fairly versatile and not limited to fall/winter nights. I can see using this in cooler days/nights in the spring and summer and during the day in the fall and winter. <br />
<br />
All this being said, I find the Parfum to be more dynamic and attention grabbing. As for SWYI comparisons, I think they are fairly different, SWYI is incense-y and this is not at all.<br />
<br />
Edit: Adding that performance on my skin is below average. I get a foot of projection max for an hour or two then it's a skin scent. I thought maybe I was going nose blind but I asked a friend's opinion and he confirmed it was barely noticeable on me. I tried with 7 sprays with lotion first then 12 sprays, which made it a stronger skin scent but didn't add much projection. Spraying on clothes does better. Bad batch? Reformulation? Not sure, but you should try on skin before you buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2270717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2270717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268729" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268729" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="firmlygraspit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2240501"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2240501.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="firmlygraspit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-Exclusif-63100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus Exclusif"title="Pegasus Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268729ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268729" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); One of the sexiest fragrances money can buy. Just incredibly intoxicating and perfect for a date night or for an intimate setting. The ladies love this one. I would highly recommend. It is definitely worthy of its high rating. 10/10 masterpiece</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2268729"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2268729#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So even say grape soda and I kinda get that as well. But when I first smelled this I instantly got fresh sweet green apples</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2268709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2268709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976047">ynbcristinho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 15:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Similar to swy intensely,but more unique in my opinion,sticky sweet vibe with some woods and cardamom for some added mass appeal,it smells a bit synthetic for me in the opening but as it dries down it becomes much better,i have a 2023 batch and it lasts about 7 hours with good projection for first 2 hours,idk if i would repurchase this,i would maybe go for le male elixir or most wanted parfum,8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2268434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2268434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267017" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267017" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rxscologne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2237953"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2237953.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rxscologne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Eau-de-Parfum-71606.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71606.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"title="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267017ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267017" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2237953">Rxscologne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 09:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very woody spicy and sweet, perfect for clubbbing or a fall/winter Cologne, I prefer this over the parfum concentration.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2267017"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2267017#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Smellios"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2193210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Smellios" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193210">Smellios</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 07:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Showed it to my female roommate and, I quote, she thought it smelled "yummy"... I think this sums up the fragrance.<br />
<br />
Really, really awesome. One of the best gourmand-y loud clubbing fragrances I've smelt. I discovered this in the airport while traveling and sprayed some on my wrist. The next day, and even after a shower, it was still there. Absolutely absurd performance accompanied by an absolutely delicious scent profile. Get it fellas, you'll love it.<br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2266904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2266904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266015" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sweetymasculine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1697858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sweetymasculine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266015ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266015" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697858">sweetymasculine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"He's a bad boy, but he showers."<br />
My signature for a while now. For some reason I keep grabbing this. It's the perfect combination of sweetness and woodiness, and in the air the fresh aspects come alive as well. The comparison to the Armani line is fair, but the woods in this are miles better. It's more masculine for sure.<br />
<br />
I remember when I smelled the parfum version last year, and I was hoping it would amp up the woods. Unfortunately, not even Azzaro could come close to this magic fragrance. The parfum is by no means bad, it still smells good, just easier to wear and fresher. I just think the parfum is somewhat redundant, as the Most Wanted DNA is not meant for 'easy wear'.<br />
<br />
Most Wanted Intense is what Coco Mademoiselle Intense is to the original: sweeter and more dense, meant for the real, more interesting woman that doesn't care about others. Except this is for men ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2266015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2266015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265167" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Caleb847"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Caleb847" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265167ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265167" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); Warm spicy top opening notes with a very smooth and sweeter, juicier and slightly powdery drydown. Very strong and has longevity of 6 to 8, versatile but slightly masc.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2265167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2265167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259068" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kojii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2044330.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kojii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044330">kojii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 22:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is really fruity? Not necessarily a problem but not what I expected. The dry down is warm woods with a caramel sweetness on top. Projection is pretty average, but the performance is good. I wore this so many times and kept flip flopping between liking it and wanting to sell it, and for the longest time I didn't know why. I now know that it's because it's way too synthetic for me. Would like catching whiffs of this from somebody else, but I can't wear it myself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2259068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2259068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258384" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FatherFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854001"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1854001.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FatherFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Ultimate-15718.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15718.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Ultimate"title="Armani Code Ultimate"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2258384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2258384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258324" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="milane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219167"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2219167.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="milane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219167">milane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 07:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>okay, so i just got my bottle of azzaro the most wanted edp. these are just initial impressions. <br />
this fragrance gets really hyped up online, yt, tiktok. <br />
my 2 cents? i like it. don't love it, but i like it. it gets compared to swy intensely for some reason, i had a bottle of it and sold it because it was wayyy too sweet for me. are they similar ? not really. they are both toffee fragrances but that's about it. <br />
swyi is way more sweat, deeper, a bit darker from the suade, better quality, cinnamon bomb, lots of tonka, caramel toffee vanilla. <br />
to me tmw is more balanced, it's a great mix of fresh spices of the cardamon with a nice transition to the toffee amberwood combo, they compliment each other well. <br />
don't know why people say they smell alike, to me they really don't. same for swy absolutely (dont have too much exp with that one, smelt it a few times only)<br />
tmw, is a good fragrance, don't get me wrong, would say it's kind of a dumb reach for cold weather, likeable and i hear the performance is really good, can't comment on that yet. what's missing in this, for me,  is the quality. could be alot better and the worst thing about it is this sweetness that is something you'd find in str8 or axe deodorants, like this nostalgic generic sweetness that i can't exactly pinpoint. <br />
now, would i still choose tmw over swyi? yes. why? because it's more wareable, more versatile and just more balanced while still keeping the likeability, and hopefully great performance.<br />
to me this is more comparable to jpg le male le parfum, just with more sweetness and less spicyness, not really close but more comparable. <br />
all in all, not what i expected, felt a bit misled by reviewers and thought i'd share my thoughts on it. <br />
7.5 - 8/10 for now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2258324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2258324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256610" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256610" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent_Sniffer69"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1990388"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1990388.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent_Sniffer69" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256610ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256610" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1990388">Scent_Sniffer69</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 15:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance has quickly climbed into my top 3 amber/sweet scentsit's that addictive and mouth-watering. The only downside? It doesn't stick around as long as I'd like, with longevity maxing out at 4-5 hours and projection fading after just an hour. If it performed better, it could easily be my signature scent. For now, Ill let it age like fine wine in a dark corner of my fridge and hope for a boost in performance.<br />
<br />
Update:<br />
after maceration, the performance is beast...really loving and enjoying it &lt;3<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Projection: 8.5/10<br />
Overall: 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2256610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2256610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; In my opinion, it smells similar to le male le parfum, but I like this one better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2256568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2256568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256280" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FourLeaf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1631172.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FourLeaf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Haramain-Perfumes/Detour-Noir-70748.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70748.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dtour Noir"title="Dtour Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256280ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256280" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631172">FourLeaf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My bottle is from November of 2023, but i don't know if batch variations are relevant for this fragrance. To me though, this smells extremely synthetic. There is almost no toffee smell at all, and the supposed cardamom is headache-inducing. When first spraying on the back of my hand and smelling it, i thought there was something wrong with my bottle. It didn't smell anything like the notes listed for it. It smelled like straight up cheap deo to me. I was excited to try this one out because i love the stronger with you line, and thought this might be a nice fragrance to keep in my rotation so i don't only use my swy intensely. How wrong i was. None of the physical fragrance stores near me have this in stock, so i couldn't smell it before buying. It was on sale online, so i thought, why not if it resembles the swy line. Mine does not unfortunately. I guess i'll let it sit for a while to see if it improves. Overall rating: 3/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2256280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2256280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252803" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194226">4Aldehyde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 20:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If a 'panty dropper' existed then trust me all this is the one. More compliments than all my other frags combined. This is La Nuit De L'Homme cranked to 11 with a dark sweet amber note. Great projection for ~3 hours. Best $80 I've ever spent. If the bottle didn't look like a Nerf gun it'd probably be way more popular.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2252803"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2252803#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2251520" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rsnero680"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2024694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rsnero680" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2251520ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2251520" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694">rsnero680</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hated it when I first smelled it, but I tried it on my skin to see if my opinion changed and I've come around on it. It's very nice, especially with the cardamom opening, but I feel like it's just a touch too sweet for me. Had the amberwood note been more prominent and the toffee note slightly dialed back, I'd like it much more and consider buying it.<br />
It's definitely strong and lasts all day, so go light on the sprays.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2251520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2251520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251514" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; S isso!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2248268"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2248268#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247975" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247975" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AGoodSir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214705"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2214705.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AGoodSir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Eau-de-Parfum-62762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Eau de Parfum"title="Eros Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247975ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247975" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214705">AGoodSir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Do you remember the old commercial for the axe soap with the guy made of chocolate? I think it was called Dark Temptation or something stupid like that. As a dumb teenager I bought into the hype. It ended up smelling like an old tootsie roll stuck between the cushions of your backseat for 2 years. Horrible <br />
<br />
This scent by azzaro though is what my dumb teenage brain imagined all those years ago seeing that commercial. This is a deep masculine scent. The toffee note is in the forefront. But never makes you smell too sweet. You smell mysterious and intriguing. Something to be desired. To me this is the epitome of a gourmand scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2247975"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2247975#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246128" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Greek model"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1004377"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1004377.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Greek model" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Aoud-Lemon-Mint-39181.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39181.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aoud Lemon Mint"title="Aoud Lemon Mint"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); I mean, for real..<br />
THIS IS JUST AN OK FRAG..<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244651" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="richthenfamous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1076303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1076303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="richthenfamous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1076303">richthenfamous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 03:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro Most Wanted Edp Intense<br />
<br />
The best Azzaro... Gets a lot of compliments, has great performance (3-4 hrs strong projection and 10+ hrs longevity), versatile, despite of its sweetness its also very masculine, and unique enough to stand on its own.<br />
<br />
Its simply done but very well blended with different nuances, get this if you want attention grabbing scent with great performance.<br />
<br />
Highly recommend 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2244651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2244651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243949" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243949" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="riaan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/364483"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.364483.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="riaan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243949ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243949" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/364483">riaan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tested this today and this is for my nose a very sweet pineapple smell. Very loud in projection. A bit synthetic at some stages but not bad. <br />
<br />
The dry down started to become warm and spicy which was a nice surprise and very welcome indeed. <br />
<br />
I must say though there is a lot of similarities with Azzoro Most Wanted Parfum which I own. <br />
<br />
The Parfum version has a more grape type opening that dries down to a vanilla burned wood type of smell. <br />
<br />
These two are really a great choice and must have. <br />
<br />
Do you want pineapple sweet to pineapple with warm spice and very loud?<br />
<br />
Or<br />
<br />
Do you want grape sweet to vanilla burned woods which is not loud but lasts a bit longer on the skin? <br />
<br />
Both is 9/10 fragrances trust me and the rest of us</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2243949"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2243949#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
