padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240415" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wan66"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2168611.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wan66" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pacific-Chill-81423.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81423.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Chill"title="Pacific Chill"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168611">Wan66</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 04:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening smells like oranges to my nose. The dry down is immaculate and you get constant whiffs of lightly spiced toffee performs really well but something is putting me off buying the full bottle. I think I am just not a gourmand type person. Its definitely better than others in the same category in my opinion, although I havent tried the parfum to be honest.<br />
<br />
Edit:<br />
<br />
I think I may have to buy a 50ml its ridiculous in the dry down its so warm and the cardamom mixed with the toffee sweetness is insane</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2240415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2240415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240267" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spillred"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194204"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2194204.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="spillred" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194204">spillred</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 00:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this months ago as a gift to myself for prom, I spent a while at my local Macys trying to find something I liked, however this one stood out to me. Sweet yet masculine with a smooth and refreshing texture, one of those fragrances you cant get enough of. I ended up getting a gift set and brought the travel vial with me to prom and applied around 5 sprays which lasted me the majority of the night leaving a noticeable and pleasant scent trail. Compliment magnet. My girlfriends favorite fragrance of mine and now nostalgic to both of us.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2240267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2240267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233087" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zeetesch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="zeetesch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199046">zeetesch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spectacular cardamom and toffee notes with almost a bubblegum-like opening. Amberwood isn't as noticeable as the toffee and cardamom, imo. Very masculine, definitely mass-appealing. Excellent longevity and range, I took a shower wearing this before going to bed and I could still smell it on my skin the morning after in a place where I only sprayed once. 3-4 hours of strong projection before wearing down to a skin scent for about 10 hours. Atomizer is okay. Very nice bottle but definitely attracts fingerprints from my handling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2233087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2233087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2230114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2230114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luis009"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054759"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luis009" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054759">Luis009</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 21:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's an intoxicating fragrance. I wore this on a date. In the opening, I was told this smelled feminine due to the sweet caramel-like opening, but then the Cardamom kicked in and it was a whole different story. You gotta wait 10 minutes till all the notes mix together. This girl really loved it, just like any other person on earth. The only drawback with it is that sillage isn't great on my skin, but other than that, this is the best designer fragrance ever made.<br />
<br />
Hopefully this won't be too popular on social media</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2229609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2229609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229160" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colognefien14"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182599"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="colognefien14" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); My signature fragrance and a must have for winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2229160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2229160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228800" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2226726" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alithefragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2155833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="alithefragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2226726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2226726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2155833">alithefragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 02:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow.. definitely one of the sexiest fragrances ever. Just blind bought this and it was worth it, wow.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2226726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2226726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2226521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2226521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karlovonamesti"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.19849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karlovonamesti" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.472.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Mountain Water"title="Silver Mountain Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2226521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2226521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19849">karlovonamesti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-22">07/22/24 20:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually like this. Fairly standard nineties barbershop top accord of cardamom and lavender (sort of like the lavender in Le Male but much softer), followed by a woody-sweet toffee-liquer mid, resting on an amberwood base. I actually don't find it to be too sweet. To me it smells rather smooth and woody, with some sweetness and piperonal, which gives it a vaguely floral edge. It also smells very basic and "generic guy" but it takes me back to my high school days of 1996/97, when dense "fresh" woody-sweet colognes were the air I breathed -- everyone had something like this on. By 1999 with Allure Homme it reached it apotheosis. This doesn't smell like Allure but the quality is on par with Chanel, and performance and sillage are admirable. Smells lush in heat, dry and woody in cold, with adequate unisex appeal, although there's no denying this leans masculine. For roughly $100 for 100 milliliters, this is a bargain. I think bottles on eBay are going for around $90 right now. If you want something that works for all seasons and all occasions, and don't mind the "beige" nature of this sort of scent, you could do a hell of a lot worse for the money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2226521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2226521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224388" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leonards"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199600"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2199600.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leonards" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224388ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224388" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199600">Leonards</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely didnt like it at first but the dry down got my attention. And then this fragrance just grew on me. Its a nice sweet but still with a hint of freshness. The performance is really moderate. In the opening it projects like a beast but after the first 20 minutes idk do i get noseblind to it or smth but its literally so weak.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This says a lot because I have a decent sized collection with plenty of fantastic niche options. Also very affordable from discounters. I cannot recommend this enough. This fragrance has average performance with amazing longevity. <br />
<br />
Longevity: 10/10<br />
Performance: 7/10<br />
Smell: 10/10<br />
Price: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2218009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2218009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Relatively long lasting, projects well. I swear to god women love this ( and I do, too ).<br />
<br />
A caramel-like sweet note with an amber base. Oh my fucking god this is some delicious, mindblowing scent. ( almost literaly, apply with care, can be headache inducing )<br />
<br />
PLEASE buy this once and keep it around for the appropriate date night use or if short on money at least try out cheap copies of stronger with you, like your touch by mason alhambra or heroic man from la rive.<br />
Good hunting :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2216101"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2216101#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2212736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmirMerobe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044874"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmirMerobe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2212736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2212736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044874">AmirMerobe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 03:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is gorgeous and very pleasant. wear it when you want to smell sexy, women's loves it so much.<br />
i can see that this could be more night time perfume and it could be worn during winter, fall, spring and summer at night (don't over spray tho).<br />
it's prominent but light in the same time, it's linear not like heavy sweet perfumes like Stronger with you Intensely or le male elixir. It made with very balanced way it not overly sweet and manly in same time and it has something fresh and soft about it that make it light but very prominent.<br />
<br />
occasions: date, gathering with friends, dinner or any outing. (night time)<br />
type: masculine - but some may find it unisex because of the scent profile - keep in mind this perfume is so sexy on the man (women's reaction approved)<br />
<br />
Scent: 9.5/10<br />
Projection: 8/10 (6-7 hrs on my skin after that it will start to get close to the skin)<br />
Performance: 9/10<br />
Versatility: 6.5/10 <br />
Value: 10/10<br />
<br />
Conclusion: its super sexy and beautiful, it represents the name very well the most wanted  and you gonna be the most wanted man among the womens when you wear this.<br />
Very rare when you see this scent profile in man perfume - very unique and I absolutely recommend it to any man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2212736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2212736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2212543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205241" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ABZ_Frags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2164111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ABZ_Frags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2164111">ABZ_Frags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 19:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first sniff of this was magical and immediately had me hooked. After wearing it a couple of times I thought it was too sweet.<br />
However, the more I smell it, the more I love it. It's addicting.<br />
Great performance as well. <br />
9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2205241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2205241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204611" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dbasil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582496"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dbasil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); Love at the first sniff. Sweet woods with some soapy spiciness sprinkled on top.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2204611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2204611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203355" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AthenaCardamom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2125213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AthenaCardamom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203355ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203355" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201365" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Auratech"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179076"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2179076.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Auratech" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201365ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201365" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179076">Auratech</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-27">06/27/24 15:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was one of my first ever designer buys that I added to my collection a few years back and I'm still in love.<br />
A date night fragrance capsulated so well in the mask of gourmand, toffee, caramel and woods. This is a refined smell that I think fits well for a sophisticated man or a man like me (25 year old). One thing that upsets me about this fragrance is its projection, I feel like I get almost NO projection unless my girlfriends face is buried into my neck... it's a shame cause this is a beautiful, delicious and sweet fragrance that deserves to have the spotlight on it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2201365"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2201365#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195785" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mosmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mosmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195785ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195785" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148100">mosmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 00:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am not a fan of gourmand fragrances, but this stuff does smell delicious. It's a toffee-centered fragrance with woody notes and cardamom, that creates this really tasty and dark scent. It can work great as a cool-weather signature or going out scent. I never wore this stuff because it wouldn't suit me, but it would smell great on a guy like Mark Wahlberg or something lol. Sillage is definitely attention grabbing and the fragrance lasts 8-10 hours. If you want to smell like a delicious, manly toffee, get this stuff.<br />
<br />
8.7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2195785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2195785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2191408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2191408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2191030" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vorotox"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2030927"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2030927.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vorotox" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/TOB-03-Tabac-Treasure-87739.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87739.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="TOB/03 Tabac-Treasure"title="TOB/03 Tabac-Treasure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2191030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2191030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2030927">Vorotox</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 11:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has everything I love about a perfume: warm, spicy, gourmand notes; very good performance, and even a good looking bottle, just like a revolver.<br />
<br />
It's very comparable to SWYI (mainly from the toffee note), but I'd much rather own this fragrance as it is a little more unique and less cloying.<br />
<br />
- Scent: 9/10<br />
- Bottle: 8.5/10 (black revolver cylinder, looks badass)<br />
- Performance: 9/10 (very good projection and lasts all day)<br />
- Price: 8.3/10 on discounters<br />
- Occasion: Winter &amp; fall evenings/nights. Night out, date night, holidays, everyday cold scent... you name it. <br />
- Number of sprays: 3-4<br />
<br />
Overall: 8.7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2191030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2191030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190963" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="6kandrew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2151472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2151472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="6kandrew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190963ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190963" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2151472">6kandrew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro The Most Wanted:<br />
<br />
This is a fragrance that is reminiscent of a fruit cocktail smoothie. The first 10 minutes opens up with an overwhelming sweetness that makes you smell like a smoothie shop. Not the most pleasant opening. <br />
<br />
This fragrance will shine when it comes down into the middle and bottom notes. It will blend into a smooth, seductive, sweet and woody aroma. <br />
<br />
It is a mass pleasing fragrance, and a refreshing one, however in my opinion this is a fragrance that lacks a backbone and doesnt want to decide what it is. Its almost like its being pulled in 5 different directions. <br />
<br />
Is it sweet? Is it woody? Is it fresh? It cant decide. <br />
<br />
Its not well blended to a single DNA, rather its almost like 2 or 3 designer fragrances mixed in one. <br />
<br />
It smells like 1 million by Pacco Rabanne had a baby with Invictus. Very much a cinnamon note in this one. <br />
<br />
I like it, but from an artistry point of view, its not good perfumery. <br />
<br />
7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2190963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2190963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190808" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Upstart85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Upstart85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168796">Upstart85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Should I get this or le male elixer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2190808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2190808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190756" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frans267"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2148683.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frans267" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148683">Frans267</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 06:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>True flankers of the Wanted series: recognizable but definitely not identical. This is delicious stuff. Toffee might sound too sweet for some, but this one isn't in my opinion. The wood and the cardamon gite it a nice balance, it has a very good longevity and is ideal for cold, wet weather. Great alternative if you feel that Stronger With You is too sweet or too heavy on the Halloween spices, or you don't feel like something with vanilla like Mercedes' Club Black.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2190756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2190756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Perfect balance between woodiness spiceness and sweetness.<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2188808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2188808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2186251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184631" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 01:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cardamom and amber wood blast with toffee to just round and smooth everything out. The main accord list on here is very spot on. It is strong . It has just enough sweetness to tie everything together . You must like amberwood because this fragrance definitely has that up front. While not like it , it kind of reminds me of Paco Rabanne 1 million but like a much more simple and easier version of that DNA. No animalic notes in this which I like. I don't know if I would buy this but not bad. Performance is pretty good projects for about 4 hours. I was able to smell this on my skin the next morning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2184631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2184631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
longevity 8.5/10<br />
sillage 8/10<br />
scent infinity/10<br />
compliment factor 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2184555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2184555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182902" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bababrr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1695936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1695936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bababrr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1695936">Bababrr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-09">06/09/24 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such an amazing fragrance from the very opening until it fades out. Strong cardamom and very warm spicy opening that melts into an amber woody middle until the toffee comes in at the dry down and gives it the nicest sweet addictive quality. All 3 stay relevant throughout the time. Backed up with lots of woodiness, it balances the sweetness to not be too overcloying but also seductive and gives it a bit of depth. <br />
<br />
Can be found on sale consistently and for the price, very worthy pick up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2182902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2182902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2181555" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bunn100"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129907"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2129907.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bunn100" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2181555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2181555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129907">bunn100</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-07">06/07/24 19:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro's The Most Wanted Eau de Parfum (EDP) is like that confident friend who walks into a room and suddenly everyones paying attention<br />
<br />
The initial blast is a mix of cardamom and red ginger. Imagine getting punched in the face by a spice rack in the best possible way. Its zesty and fresh, making you feel like you just stepped out of a cool showeron a tropical islandduring a thunderstorm. Yeah, its that intense.<br />
<br />
As the top notes mellow, the heart reveals itself with a delicious blend of toffee and caramel. Yes, you read that right. Toffee and caramel. At this point, you might start to wonder if you accidentally walked into a candy store. But no, its your cologne. And now you smell like the most irresistible dessert at the fancy buffet.<br />
<br />
The grand finale features amberwood and bourbon vanilla. Think of it as the part where you settle into a leather armchair with a glass of the finest whiskey. Its warm, smooth, and sophisticated, like a hug from someone who smells really, really good.<br />
<br />
Longevity and Sillage<br />
The Most Wanted EDP sticks around like that one friend who never leaves the party. Expect it to last a solid 8-10 hours. And the sillage? Lets just say people will smell you coming from across the room. This scent is not for the faint of heart or those who prefer to blend into the background.<br />
<br />
Versatility<br />
This fragrance is like a Swiss Army knifeuseful in almost any situation. Date night? Check. Office meeting? Check (just maybe go easy on the spritzes). Grocery shopping? Why not? If you want to smell amazing while choosing the ripest avocados, go for it.<br />
<br />
Overall Impressions<br />
Azzaro The Most Wanted EDP is the cologne equivalent of a movie star: bold, captivating, and slightly over-the-top. Its the scent for the guy who doesnt just enter a roomhe makes an entrance. If youre ready to be the most wanted, then this fragrance is your new best friend.<br />
<br />
Pros:<br />
Attention-grabbing and unique scent<br />
Long-lasting performance<br />
Versatile for various occasions<br />
Cool, conversation-starting bottle design<br />
<br />
Cons:<br />
Might be too intense for some (not everyone wants to smell like a sexy candy store)<br />
Not ideal for those who prefer subtle scents<br />
<br />
In conclusion, Azzaro The Most Wanted EDP is for the man who wants to be noticedand remembered. So go ahead, spray it on, and get ready to be the most wanted guy at your next event. Just remember, with great power comes great responsibility!<br />
<br />
Sniff-O-Meter Score<br />
<br />
Scent Appeal: 4 - Bold and intriguing, with a seductive blend that feels like a powerful, mysterious allure.<br />
Longevity : 4 - Stays around for a good part of the day, making sure youre still making an impression.<br />
Sillage: 4 - Leaves a noticeable trail that announces your presence without overwhelming.<br />
Uniqueness: 3 - Distinctive and appealing, but not completely breaking new ground in the world of seductive fragrances.<br />
Versatility: 4 - Versatile enough for both daytime and evening wear, fitting a range of occasions with ease.<br />
<br />
Overall Sniff-O-Meter Score: 19/25</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2181555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2181555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; the smell is absolutely sweet and sexy while its there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2178289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2178289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is leaning a bit towards the femine side but still is a massive compliment getter. Very good addition to any collection and perfect for going out and cold winter nights.<br />
Longevity is absolutely insane on my skin, still smell it the day after.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2174615"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2174615#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2173798" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crlneria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1713240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="crlneria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2173798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2173798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713240">crlneria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 13:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Want to add more sweet to my collection and so happy I got this. It plays out exactly as the note list describes. Opens with a blast of cardamom. Instantly loved this one. Super sweet but is clearly balanced with some freshness. Initial drydown is pure toffee, but it is soft and light and stays closer to the skin and creates a wonderful scent bubble. Then after like 4-5 hours dries into a woody skin scent. Lovely fragrance and a staple for any collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2173798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2173798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2169426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2169426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168499" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168499" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rsnero680"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2024694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rsnero680" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168499ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168499" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694">rsnero680</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 11:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally found a store that had a tester of this, and I'm really disappointed. The toffee note is way too domineering, which results in a fragrance that's too sweet for my liking. I was expecting more cardamom and for the sweetness to be only an undertone. The opening is also a bit synthetic.<br />
If you don't like sweet scents, stay away from this. If you do, go ahead and buy it. I just don't think I'm the target demographic for this. It's nowhere near as sickeningly sweet as SWY Intensely though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2168499"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2168499#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168468" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Berk Y."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2021922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Berk Y." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Kingdom-of-Bahrain-48268.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48268.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kingdom of Bahrain"title="Kingdom of Bahrain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021922">Berk Y.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells swy absolutely<br />
<br />
scent: 8/10<br />
sillage: 6/10<br />
longevity: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2168468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2168468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984964">Gaboich</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 03:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is in my opinion way better than TMW parfum. This one feels more caramelly which i love and the other smells a bit fruitier and sweeter imo. Im not a huge fan of the other one as it kinda smells like sweet carrots like in born in roma edt which i actually own. I do like born in roma edt and it gives my memories but idk TMW parfum just feels more warm and cozy than that one but feels weird snd synthetic at the same time<br />
<br />
But back to this one. For me this only lasts 5 hours on my skin. Maybe i should let it macerate but other designer fragrances last pretty good on me for example<br />
<br />
Le beau le parfum: 8 hours<br />
Valentino uomo intense: 8 hours<br />
Stronger with you Intensely: 9-10 hours<br />
Born in roma edt: 6 hours<br />
<br />
so idk but it smells pretty good. Not as similar to SWYI as i thought. I kinda blind bought this cuz i saw that there was cardamom, Toffee and Amberwood in this and it was apparently similar to SWYI</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
