Toffee is sweet without making you smell like a candy shop, and amber gives it class.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2167131"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2167131#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164344" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MIKEMURF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2142213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2142213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MIKEMURF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2142213">MIKEMURF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am surprised that no one has compared Azzaro most wanted intense to Invictus Victory which has a very similar vibe with a fresh tone layered over a gourmand base and similar color scheme for the bottle presentation. It's mass appealing and long lasting. It does not remind me of Stronger with you Intensely from Armani... Not even close. I have all three aforementioned perfumes in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2164344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2164344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162887" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162887" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="charlieq08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/986676"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.986676.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="charlieq08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-Est-Belle-Iris-Absolu-79245.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79245.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie Est Belle Iris Absolu"title="La Vie Est Belle Iris Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162887ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162887" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/986676">charlieq08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-21">05/21/24 03:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm in love with this fragrance. It sweetness makes me daydream of nice things.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2162887"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2162887#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160384" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tracershy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181886"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tracershy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted"title="The Most Wanted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181886">tracershy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Apart from the very good Wanted by Night, this series is not particularly successful in my opinion.  Newer release The Most Wanted and its equivalent in the Parfum concentration, are already a step back and taking a path towards greater improvement.  And although I actually like sweet scents very much, and when there are some interesting nuances in such a fragrance and there is something more going on in them than just the effect of grinding my teeth from too much sweetness, I can appreciate them.  Meanwhile, The Most Wanted is simply a club improvement like many others on the market.<br />
 There is a small element of surprise here, as the opening composition welcomes us with a fresh blast of cardamom.  Thanks to it, the beginning is spicy, spicy and attracts attention.  However, quite quickly the toffee takes over, dripping with icing, dipped in sugar, very sweet.  Too sweet.  Tones of caramel and vanilla.  Something that has already been played many times in other perfumes.  There is some amber wood in the base, but in my opinion it is in the style of other similar perfumes - flat and sickly sweet.  This is the kind of perfume that, after a good start, only loses its scent over time and smells worse and worse.  Typical club player.  And, as befits a club member, the parameters are very good.<br />
 It's not a bad scent, in its gourmand genre it can be considered quite a solid proposition, the spicy-spicy beginning is also good, but after the interesting Wanted by Night I was hoping for something better.  As a result, we get another secondary, caramel, sticky sweet, but made quite well.  Just enough.  No tragedy, but also no major impact.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2160384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2160384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158410" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Percell7777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2022733"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Percell7777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Phantom-Intense-89717.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89717.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Phantom Intense"title="Phantom Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158410ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158410" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2022733">Percell7777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 16:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was really looking forward to smelling this as I got it as a gift but its just way too sweet. I dont know if its the cardamom or the amber thats doing it. I have other cardamom fragrances but they are nice so maybe its a mix of both. Dont get much toffee at all. Will let it sit for a few months to see if it tones down more fingers crossed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2158410"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2158410#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2157778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2154372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2154372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153946" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moneybag08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2130749"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2130749.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moneybag08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2130749">Moneybag08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-12">05/12/24 16:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont own this, but my friend does and I have the azzaro most wanted parfum. They are similar but this one caught my attention more. I love mine for the winter and I think these are both 10/10s but this one smells way better off the opening imo. Not too popular of a fragrance, smells amazing, perfect for late date nights and cold/windy/winter weather, pretty good longevity and decent projection. You can find both of these legit for around 130-150 dollars in my experience, maybe cheaper but Id rather pay the extra 10 to ensure its legit</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2153946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2153946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="66826" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1666743" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1666743" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nichonzalez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1527587"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1527587.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nichonzalez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-Parfum-73664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted Parfum"title="The Most Wanted Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1666743ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1666743" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1527587">nichonzalez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-15">10/15/22 11:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i wanna stick my dick in it<br />
favorite all time second to maybe fahrenheit or spicebomb</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="1666743"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=1666743#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1329862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1329862" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nobody.Really"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1082404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1082404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nobody.Really" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Profumo-34761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Profumo"title="Armani Code Profumo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1329862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1329862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1082404">Nobody.Really</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-21">04/21/21 21:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the Culture<br />
<br />
Given how mercurial the fragrance community tends to be, this fragrance will likely be lambasted for its redundancy both within its line, and within the market abroad.  After all, this is a flanker of a fragrance which borrowed inspiration heavily from its contemporaries and does not deviate much from its sibling fragrances.  <br />
<br />
That notwithstanding, The Most Wanted is actually quite nice, and along with Wanted By Night, competes directly in the same realm as The One EDP, Stronger With You ( et al.), the constantly reiterated installments of the Armani Code lineage, as well as the remaining plethora of preeminent date night, designer releases (e.g: One Million Prive, La Nuit De LHomme).  And, to be fair to the oft cynical majority:  this particular genre is jam-packed with terrific offerings  none of which have done anything at all to revivify the interests of the well-initiated turned resentful elitists.<br />
<br />
Unlike Wanted By Night, which utilizes a strong, sweet cinnamon in conjunction with mandarin orange, tobacco, and lemon to create a very marmalade-like fragrance fortified by a salubrious dose of Iso E Super, The Most Wanted is less loud.  Cardamom replaces the cinnamon, and there also seems to be a further rearrangement of notes.  To my nose, there is still Iso E Super, and the Amberwood is not the only note providing the quite sturdy base.  If I had to speculate, it would seem at least several different aroma chemicals were used in varying amounts, and bound with the Iso E Super and Vanillin to structure the olfactive impression that is echoed in Wanted By Night.  <br />
<br />
The similarities between The Most Wanted and Wanted By Night are overtly apparent to anyone with a functional nose.  Which, to some extent, explains the similarities to Invictuss most recent addition, Invictus: Victory.  In fact, the original Wanted is as similar to the original Invictus as The Most Wanted is similar to Invictus: Victory when theyve both dried down.  Seriously, on paper, theyre approximately 75%-85% similar.  <br />
<br />
Despite all of this, I find The Most Wanted to be just as good as Wanted By Night  and more versatile.  If I had to choose between the two and could only have one, my personal pick would be The Most Wanted.  It is not as loud, but nearly as sweet, and inviting and has comparable longevity.  Moreover, it isnt as volatile in the heat.  Whereas if you were to wear Wanted By Night on a summers evening you could asphyxiate someone with the cinnamon, with The Most Wanted, that wont be the case.  Thats not to give you the impression The Most Wanted is wildly more refined  because it isnt.  Its only the fact some of the more overwhelmingly saccharine notes have either been removed or adjusted so as not to be as intrusive early in the fragrances lifespan.  <br />
<br />
The most pressing issue with the fragrance will be whether or not the coterie of YouTube FragComm mainstays grant The Most Wanted their seal of approval.  If they do, this fragrance will be on every date night, and fall/winter top ten list for the next year.  If not, it will be lambasted, and fall into obscurity until it is discontinued  at which point, it will see the customary resurgence of relevance before it vanishes.  Then, Armaf and DUA will offer their renditions, because thats what they do.  <br />
<br />
If you enjoyed Wanted by Night, but maybe found it excessive, sample The Most Wanted.  I think youll be pleasantly surprised.<br />
<br />
I gave Wanted by Night a 8.5/10.  I believe The Most Wanted is marginally better.  Lets go with a 8.75/10. <br />
<br />
Also, this is unisex, despite leaning masculine.  So ladies, if youre looking for a gender-bender, give it a whirl.<br />
<br />
As always:  stay safe, and stay radiant.  See you around.<br />
<br />
<br />
Very Sincerely &amp; Respectfully Yours,<br />
<br />
Nobody.Really</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="1329862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=1329862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2080942" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2080942" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kasherquon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042087"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2042087.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kasherquon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2080942ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2080942" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042087">kasherquon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-03">03/03/24 10:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>hoes love this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2080942"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2080942#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1387522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1387522" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lockon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1036088"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1036088.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lockon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted"title="The Most Wanted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1387522ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1387522" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1036088">Lockon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-06">08/06/21 00:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a straight beast of a fragrance.<br />
My co-workers love it.<br />
I received two unsolicited compliments.<br />
So you can't tell me shit, for the rest of the day.<br />
I'M HYPED SON!<br />
<br />
I need to calm down...as a guy, we don't get'em that often, if ever.<br />
So I'm gonna remember it.<br />
<br />
There are only three notes in The Most Wanted; Amber wood, toffee &amp; cardamom. <br />
<br />
I definitely smell the Amber wood throughout, but on my skin...the other two notes fuse into a granny smith apple scent. Which I like, ....<br />
And thats it.<br />
<br />
It's simple and lovely . <br />
Must have for gourmand lovers. <br />
Reminds me of a warm apple pie.<br />
Will be getting a backup bottle. <br />
<br />
I used six sprays...both wrist, back &amp; front of my neck, chest, and front of my shirt.<br />
<br />
Will I buy this again? YES!<br />
<br />
What's the strength of this? EDP.<br />
<br />
Does this fragrance enter BEAST MODE, good, just okay or weak sauce at best? BREAST MODE! It's meant for the winter, and I'm wearing it during the summer. <br />
<br />
Can you use it as a unisex scent? No...<br />
<br />
Am I willing to trade this fragrance? No.<br />
<br />
Should You Skip It, Sample It First or Blind Buy It? Blind Buy worthy if you like Wanted by night &amp; gourmands. For everyone else,  Sample it first.<br />
<br />
Very similar to these fragrances; Azzaro Wanted By Night &amp; Stronger with you. <br />
<br />
Is it the old, new formulation? New.<br />
<br />
What's its availability; in production, limited edition run or discontinued? In production, may be a limited run.  <br />
<br />
SKU Number: 3614273521307<br />
Batch Number: 91U2003<br />
Production Date: 2021<br />
<br />
Age: 21 &amp; up<br />
From: Macy's <br />
Size: 100ML<br />
Scent: 5/5 (Smells AMAZING!).<br />
Value: 2/5 (I PAID FULL PRICE, HEARD IT WAS A limited run &amp; didn't want to chance it with waiting for it to hit discount sites, and it's no longer in production).<br />
Sillage: 5/5 (Great, I tried this out during the summer, this is meant for the dead of winter).<br />
Longevity: 5/5 (Beast!).<br />
Creativity: 5/5 (Only three notes, but it smells awesome).<br />
Projection: 5/5 (easy two hours) <br />
Versatility: 5/5 (Anytime and anywhere).<br />
Compliments: 5/5 (Lovely).<br />
<br />
Hope this helps someone.<br />
And until next time, I'll catch you on the flipside.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="1387522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=1387522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1329537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1329537" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ultramale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1149075"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1149075.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ultramale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-Cologne-51692.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51692.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus Cologne"title="Aventus Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1329537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1329537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1149075">ultramale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-21">04/21/21 12:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just picked this up from Ulta. It's so new - they didn't even have it on the shelves yet. Beautiful matte black bottle. Atomizer distribution is wide and covers a lot of skin/clothing. Let me preface by saying I was not a fan of Wanted By Night. Too much cinnamon and too spicy for me. But this one is AMAZING if you like sweet fragrances. It opens with some bubblegum sweetness and quickly transitions into a sexy toffee/amberwood combination. It kind of smells like a fresh (not burnt) caramel. Seriously, the drydown is intoxicating and delicious. I've never smelled anything like this in a designer fragrance. Youthful enough but mature at the same time. Fresh and a little dark. Three hours in and still getting big whiffs. No complaints on performance. When I came home after spraying it on, my wife took a deep exhale and asked if she could eat me. This is not a gourmand and I know it's going to pull massive amounts of compliments. My favorite 2021 designer release by far!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="1329537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=1329537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="66826" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1558261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1558261" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="realitygreene"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258320"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258320.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="realitygreene" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/J-adore-Eau-de-Toilette-2011-13017.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13017.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="J'adore Eau de Toilette 2011"title="J'adore Eau de Toilette 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1558261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1558261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258320">realitygreene</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-06">05/06/22 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro The Most Wanted is my boyfriend's only fragrance. We went shopping together and tested out Wanted by Night and both immediately loved it. So he went to buy what he thought was that fragrance, but the shelves at Ulta were not stocked correctly. We should have double checked, but alas, we did not. He decided to keep it because he ended up liking this one (but not as much as Wanted by Night).<br />
<br />
I, however, don't really love this. The cardamom is so harsh and never mellows out. This fragrance smells nice on him, but he mostly wears it to work anyway, so luckily I don't have to put up with the harsh scent all that often. I also tried testing this on myself and it was definitely a no go. <br />
<br />
I actually plan to buy Wanted by Night for myself because it smells so delicious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="1558261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=1558261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1331550" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1331550" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OnyxLotus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228106"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1228106.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OnyxLotus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clive-Christian/C-for-Men-Woody-Leather-With-Oudh-Intense-47337.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47337.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="C for Men Woody Leather With Oudh Intense"title="C for Men Woody Leather With Oudh Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1331550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1331550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228106">OnyxLotus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-24">04/24/21 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong bubble gum with sensual sweet toffee on an amber wood back bone. To me this is a fringe gourmand, thick and sweet foodie elements. Very solid performance. Its rather redundant to many other designer releases in this category but very pleasant if you appreciate this common DNA profile. Unisex, leaning feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="1331550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=1331550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1375598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1375598" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lyra.meurer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/241244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.241244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lyra.meurer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Molecule-02-3606.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3606.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Molecule 02"title="Molecule 02"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1375598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1375598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/241244">lyra.meurer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-14">07/14/21 00:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Idk if I was somehow trying a different perfume or what, but I don't get the hype. Didn't like this one at all. The cardamom and toffee are both synthetic smelling, making the first hour or two unpleasant, and then it dries down to that acrid amber that I associate with so many generic colognes and Axe body spray. There's a hint of gourmand might-have-been with the toffee, except it's like a computer's idea of toffee. Honestly disappointing -- there was potential here for something delicious and different and it was utterly wasted. Even so, it could be worse.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="1375598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=1375598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1568423" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1568423" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fredrik80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499072"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fredrik80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1568423ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1568423" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499072">fredrik80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-21">05/21/22 10:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of a few fragrances that give me a headache, very sweet and synthetic smelling. To me it smells like Stronger With You which also has this over the top sweetness that drowns out everything. Drydown is pure amberwood like many others. It lasts forever though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="1568423"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=1568423#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2053157" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Iwantcompliments2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1777909.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Iwantcompliments2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2053157ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2053157" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777909">Iwantcompliments2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If youre planning to buy this, please be aware of the batch differences. I bought it in person at a store and it smells nothing like the tester that Ive tried before making my decision. While the tester was spicy and a relatively more complex smell, the bottle that I have is just straight toffee. Its a cold metallic toffee smell that is no way close to the other richer batch.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="66826"comment_id="2053157"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html?ccid=2053157#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="66826" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"

                <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Brands</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Lattafa-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Dior.html" class="en2inter">Dior</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">3.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Tom-Ford.html" class="en2inter">Tom Ford</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>

    <script>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
